title: Monkeypox Vaccine Available By Appointment at Westchester Medical Center
cleaned_text: at Westchester Medical Center WMCHealth offers drive-through monkeypox vaccine services at Westchester Medical Center. Vaccines are available by appointment only. Call [914.326.2060](tel:914.326.2060) to make an appointment. Supplies are limited. Please refer to the [Westchester County Department of Health](https://health.westchestergov.com/monkeypox-information) for vaccine eligibility guidelines and eligibility-related questions. Drive-through facility located at 15 Oval Connector, Valhalla, NY
